title: shrSTi sthityantakAriNI
sahitya:
shrSTi sthityantakAriNi jaganmOhini


anupallavi

  aSTAdasha vAdaya nAda AnandalOlE 
iSThArthava nIDu jananI hima shailabAlE


caraNam    vanaja bhavEndrAdi dEva vandanIya padmapadE sanaka 
sananda nAtyakhila sAdhujanA bhayapradEkanaka kashipu ripu 
sOdari kAncana vasanE dhanapati sakha harikEsha sati salahennanu
